= Requirements =
|| *WARNING*: It has been reported multiple times, that newer revisions of SNEEK won't work with devkitARM release 26 and above. ||

  * This guide assumes you have gotten the basic SNEEK build environment up and running based on the [StartupGuide].
[http://det1re.de/a/sneek/sneek_div.png]

= Introduction =

A quick guide on how to use the di module.

[http://det1re.de/a/sneek/sneek_div.png]

= Information =
  * If you have used the Batch file from the [StartupGuide], you will need to build using the build_boot2.cmd in the subversion.
  * Once you have completed this, you will have three bin files boot2_usb.bin, boot2_di.bin and boot2_sd.bin.
